channel.title: How do i turn screen black?
channel.description:
like how do i make there screen go black and then they have to click x number of time to make it go back to regular and it saves and starts on startup if they restarted there pc and it countines on how many clicks he made???
i need it in visual c++,visual c#,visual vb,or java thx

item.title: How do i turn screen black?
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

Private Declare Function GetAsyncKeyState Lib "user32" (ByVal vkey As Long) As Integer

Private Sub Timer1_Timer()
If GetAsyncKeyState(vbKeyF12) Then

Form1.BackColor = 0
Form1.BorderStyle = 0
Form1.WindowState = 2

End If
End Sub

I just did this off the top of my head so I haven’t tested it but it should work. Works by pressing f12 (obviously)
